DataElement.preferredName: Participating Study Site Sentinel Lymph Node Procedure Experience Documentation Submission Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not the participating facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted submitted documentation of their experience with sentinel lymph node procedures that produce an effect, or are intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participation Study Site Sentinel Lymph Node Intervention or Procedure Experience Document Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of taking part in an activity._A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._The first lymph node to which cancer is likely to spread from the primary tumor. Cancer cells may appear first in the sentinel node before spreading to other lymph nodes._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities._A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of taking part in an activity.:A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

Concepts.definition: The act of taking part in an activity.
A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

Property.preferredName: Sentinel Lymph Node Intervention or Procedure Experience Document Submission
Property.preferredDefinition: The first lymph node to which cancer is likely to spread from the primary tumor. Cancer cells may appear first in the sentinel node before spreading to other lymph nodes.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.:A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.:The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

Concepts.definition: The first lymph node that is affected by cancer spread from the primary site.  Sentinel lymph node biopsy is part of the staging work-up to determine early metastasis to regional lymph nodes in patients with breast carcinoma or melanoma.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
